Issue.creator: ryjones
Issue.summary: Logs for s390x jobs are orders of magnitude larger than other platforms.
Issue.description: Logs for successful fabric-verify-x86_64 jobs are between 60 and 120 kilobytes. Logs for successful fabric-verify-s390x jobs are between 18 and 24 megabytes. This means the log retention for -s390x is much shorter than it should be. Please reduce the size of these logs.
